author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Temporarily blocks an IP address or CIDR. Default is 30 minutes.
commands.name: threatx-block-ip

commands.description: Unblocks a blocked IP address or CIDR.
commands.name: threatx-unblock-ip

commands.description: Adds an IP address or CIDR to the block list.
commands.name: threatx-blacklist-ip

commands.description: Removes an IP or CIDR from the block list.
commands.name: threatx-unblacklist-ip

commands.description: Adds an IP address or CIDR to the allow list.
commands.name: threatx-whitelist-ip

commands.description: Removes an IP address or CIDR from the allow list.
commands.name: threatx-unwhitelist-ip

commands.description: Get high-level Entity information using the Entity ID, Entity Name, or Entity IP. For example: !threatx-get-entities timeframe=1-Day entity_name=CynicalGraaf,MJ12Bot entity_id= 566056709675514809 entity_ip=12.12.12.12,14.14.14.14. Note: long look-back timeframes for a large number of Entities can timeout.
commands.name: threatx-get-entities

commands.description: Returns the notes attached to an Entity, by Entity ID.
commands.name: threatx-get-entity-notes

commands.description: Add a new note to the entity. For example: !threatx-add-entity-note entity_id=566056709695514809 message="test note"
commands.name: threatx-add-entity-note

integration.description: The ThreatX integration allows automated enforcement and intel gathering actions.
integration.name: ThreatX

description: The ThreatX integration allows automated enforcement and intel gathering actions.
name: ThreatX
